targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])

SELECT MIN(price) FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])

SELECT AVG(price) FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])

SELECT MAX(price) FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])

SELECT 'https://auto.ria.com/uk' || url as link, engine, gear, year, CAST(mileage AS INT) * 1000 AS mileage, price FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])
ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT AVG(mileage) * 1000 FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])

SELECT CAST(mileage/10 AS INT) * 10 as mileage, COUNT(id) FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])

 GROUP BY CAST(mileage/10 AS INT)*10;

SELECT CAST(price/100 AS INT) * 100 AS price, count(id) FROM autoria WHERE 
                                brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} 
                                AND mileage BETWEEN ${min_mileage:raw} AND ${max_mileage:raw} 
                                AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND equipment LIKE any(array[${equipment:sqlstring}]) 
                                AND modification LIKE any(array[${modification:sqlstring}])

 GROUP BY CAST(price/100 AS INT) ORDER BY price;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT(model) FROM autoria WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]);
list.label: Model
list.name: model
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT(model) FROM autoria WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]);

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT(engine)
FROM autoria
WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}])
  AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}])
  AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw}
  AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}])
  AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}])
list.label: Engine
list.name: engine
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT(engine)
FROM autoria
WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}])
  AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}])
  AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw}
  AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}])
  AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}])

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT(generation) FROM autoria WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]);

list.name: generation
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT(generation) FROM autoria WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]) AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw} AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}]) AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}]) AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}]);

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT(equipment)
FROM autoria
WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}])
  AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}])
  AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw}
  AND fuel LIKE any(array[${fuel:sqlstring}])
  AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}])
  AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}])
  AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}])

list.name: equipment
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT(equipment)

  AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}])
  AND year BETWEEN ${year_min:raw} AND ${year_max:raw}

  AND generation LIKE any(array[${generation:sqlstring}])
  AND gear LIKE any(array[${gear:sqlstring}])
  AND engine LIKE any(array[${engine:sqlstring}])

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT(equipment) FROM autoria WHERE brand LIKE any(array[${brand:sqlstring}]) AND model LIKE any(array[${model:sqlstring}]);
